data.name: $FILE_ID
data.comment: {locked} This is the file ID for this localization file. This string value should not be used or translated.

data.name: PanelTitle
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The title of the Icon picker panel.

data.name: SearchBoxPlaceholderText
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The placeholder text for the action of the search box on Icon picker.

data.name: SaveButtonText
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The text of the action of Save button on Icon picker.

data.name: CancelButtonText
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The text of the Cancel button on Icon picker.

data.name: CountStringIntervals
data.comment: {NoLocRule}[Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] "||" are separated intervals for the numbers. These intervals will be used to pick the right local text for the specific number of elements.

data.name: ClearButtonAriaLabel
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] Contextual label of the clear button inside search box which is used to clear the search input.

data.name: IconsCountTemplate
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] Message read by the screen reader for counting icons. {0} represents the number of icons which is determined by CountStringIntervals.

data.name: GeneralMessage
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The screen reader message for people with disabilities to know the context within icon picker. {0} is the count of icons. E.g. 5 icons. Using IconsCountTemplate.

data.name: SearchMessage
data.value: There are {0} in your search results.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The screen reader message for people with disabilities to know the context within icon picker after search. {0} is the count of icons. E.g. 5 icons. Using IconsCountTemplate.

data.name: IconSelectedMessage
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The screen reader message for people with disabilities to get notification when user select one icon. {0} is the icon name.

data.name: IconPickerInstructionMessage
data.value: Icons. Search for an icon and then press enter or space to select an icon. Use Select to use the selected icon.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SOX-IconPicker] The screen reader message for telling customer how to use the icon picker.
